message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This ensures a good starting point for both of us.
I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  This acknowledges your initial offer, but takes into account the decreasing value of the money. Let's be reasonable and end this game early.
I understand the inflation factor, but let's compromise.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to move forward, considering the diminishing value of the money.
